name: Henry's Really Cool Github Page
body:
# Welcome!
Hi, and welcome to my Github page where I temporarily keep information regarding my projects until my official portfolio is complete (really soon)!

# Projects
Here is a small sampling of projects I've worked on in the past
(and that I still have the source code to):

### Milkshaker
[Source](https://github.com/yellowjello/milkshaker)

Shake some milk, 'nuff said.

*Note: You need a computer/browser combination that supports HTML5 DeviceMotion.

[Play it here!](https://yellowjello.github.io/milkshaker/)

### 2048 With Voice
[Source](https://github.com/yellowjello/2048-voice)

2048 for cool people. A version of 2048 that has support for voice commands.

*Note: Voice functionality is only available on browsers that support the Web Speech API, which at the time of writing is only Google Chrome.

[Play it here!](https://yellowjello.github.io/2048-voice/)

### UBC Course Availability Checker
[Source](https://github.com/yellowjello/ubccourseavailabilityextension)

A Chrome extension that allows a user to add courses to a watchlist and be notified as courses become available.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
